message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet the highest standards. It comes with a variety of features that could potentially enhance your daily routine. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its cost. I am offering it to you for $95. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your response.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $75 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on pricing, but I must maintain the integrity of our product's value. I am willing to negotiate further, so I am proposing a price of $85 for the product. I hope this aligns better with both our expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've considered your proposal, and while I appreciate the effort, I still feel that $80 would be a fair price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
